definition: The term "unsichtbar" refers to something that cannot be seen or is not visible to the naked eye. It is commonly used to describe objects, beings, or phenomena that lack the ability to be perceived visually.

examples.english: The invisible girl disappeared without a trace.

examples.german: Die unsichtbare Tinte wird sichtbar, wenn man sie erhitzt.
examples.english: The invisible ink becomes visible when heated.

examples.german: Die unsichtbare Hand des Marktes regelt das Angebot und die Nachfrage.
examples.english: The invisible hand of the market regulates supply and demand.

examples.german: Die unsichtbare Gefahr lauerte im Dunkeln.
examples.english: The invisible danger lurked in the dark.
